com.gpluscb.challonge_listener

Class ChallongeExtension

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.stefangeyer.challonge.Challonge
      • com.gpluscb.challonge_listener.ChallongeExtension
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    at.stefangeyer.challonge.service.ChallongeService

    public class ChallongeExtension
extends at.stefangeyer.challonge.Challonge
    An extension of the Challonge class with a few utility methods mainly focused on methods to get tournaments with complete data to the Attachment level.
    Note that those methods need to use multiple api requests and are therefore more resource consuming.

        Creates a completely functional instance. It can be used directly.

        credentials - The credentials used to log into the Challonge api
        serializer - The serializer used to deserialize the Challonge api json responses
        restClient - The restClient to communicate with the Challonge api

      • doesTournamentExist

        public boolean doesTournamentExist(java.lang.String tournament)
                            throws at.stefangeyer.challonge.exception.DataAccessException
        Checks whether a tournament exists
        Parameters:
        tournament - Tournament ID (e.g. 10230) or URL (e.g. 'single_elim' for challonge.com/single_elim). If assigned to a subdomain, URL format must be :subdomain-:tournament_url (e.g. 'test-mytourney' for test.challonge.com/mytourney)
        Returns:
        Whether the tournament exists
        Throws:
        at.stefangeyer.challonge.exception.DataAccessException - Exchange with the rest api or validation failed in a way that does not indicate that the tournament does not exist

      • getTournament

        public at.stefangeyer.challonge.model.Tournament getTournament(java.lang.String tournament,
                                                               boolean includeParticipants,
                                                               boolean includeMatches,
                                                               boolean includeAttachments)
                                                        throws at.stefangeyer.challonge.exception.DataAccessException
        Retrieve a single tournament record created with or co-owned by your account.
        Parameters:
        tournament - Tournament ID (e.g. 10230) or URL (e.g. 'single_elim' for challonge.com/single_elim). If assigned to a subdomain, URL format must be :subdomain-:tournament_url (e.g. 'test-mytourney' for test.challonge.com/mytourney)
        includeParticipants - Include a list of participants in the response
        includeMatches - Include a list of matches in the response
        includeAttachments - Include a list of attachments for each match in the response
        Returns:
        The matching tournament
        Throws:
        at.stefangeyer.challonge.exception.DataAccessException - Exchange with the rest api or validation failed
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - includeAttachments is true but includeMatches is false

      • getTournamentsWithFullData

                                                                                     throws at.stefangeyer.challonge.exception.DataAccessException
        Retrieve all the tournaments created with or co-owned by your account with all participants, matches and attachments.
        Returns:
        The tournaments
        Throws:
        at.stefangeyer.challonge.exception.DataAccessException - Exchange with the rest api or validation failed. Can occur if a tournament is significantly changed during the operation
